name: Beloved Housework
description:
I did this game for the 2019 Global Game Jam, the theme is "What home means to you"

Home has an important meaning to me: it is where I escape from the burden of life, relaxing and doing housework. This is a peaceful game in which you do housework with your mouse. Drag them and throw them into the correct containers to keep your house clean! 

How to play: You have 2 min to trouw items into correct places 

White clean clothes: closet

Dark dirty clothes: laundry bag 

Plates: sink 

Apple: Fridge 

Coin: piggy bank 

Press R to restart 

Alt F4: Quit

GGJ site: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/beloved-housework
